name: testing-data-creation
notes: This dataset contains Who, What, and Where(3W) data for the Muyinga, Cankuzo, Makamba, Ruyigi, Rutana and Rumonge provinces in Burundi. The operational presence of the various organisations (who) by sector (what), and location (where) at the province level and at commune level for communes Giteranyi, Muyinga, Gisigara, Rumonge, Gisuru, Kiniyia, Kayogoro, Nyanza-Lac and Giharo.

organization.name: fieldsdata
organization.title: Fields Data
organization.description:
Fields Data is a humanitarian data-preparedness organisation leveraging local expertise to mitigate the effects of disasters.

We collect and share  organizational information to facilitate partnerships and help projects increase their efficiencies and social impact. We envision a humanitarian and development community working together to reduce duplication, optimise resources and maximise their impacts.

title: Burundi- Muyinga, Cankuzo, Makamba, Ruyigi, Rutana, Rumonge: Operational Presence
